nodes.title: [MJAVADOC-512] - Even when <javadocVersion>1.8.0</javadocVersion> matches there still is a warning.
[MJAVADOC-642] do not try to read from links in offline mode.
Bump actions/cache from v2.1.1 to v2.1.5
[MJAVADOC-619] Maven Javadoc bottom claims copyright for future years
[MJAVADOC-329] - Allow generation of empty javadoc JARs
[MJAVADOC-667]  Fix broken links in Javadocs comments and site page.
[MJAVADOC-664] - Fix stale javadoc data detection on Windows.
[MJAVADOC-660] - No periods without complete sentences in @param fixes
[MJAVADOC-663] Add GitHub Action to confirm build PR
[MJAVADOC-650] -  Fix Javadoc search path for Java 9+
[MJAVADOC-662] The fix operation wrongly generate illegal javadoc for static final fields.
MJAVADOC-661: Fix for tagletArtifact fails to scan multi-release JARs (MRJARs) for Taglets
[MJAVADOC-658] The fix operation wrongly delete generic functions's generic-class javadoc if exist, and add it if lack, and will not create it if param part of javadoc be empty
[MJAVADOC-657] The fix operation duplicates annotations on private methods that have an annotation line between the method body and the javadoc comments.
replace deprecated method scheduled for removal and update archiver
[MJAVADOC-638] upgrade Doxia Sitetools to 1.9.2 to remove dependency on Struts
[MJAVADOC-639] include requires static from external dependencies for all modules
[MJAVADOC-636] exclude some modules from aggregated javadoc
[MJAVADOC-613] exclude skipped modules from javadoc aggregate
[MJAVADOC-620] Do not ignore JARs w/o module info when building classpath
[MJAVADOC-628] - add javadoc.io link pattern when <detectLink> option is …
[MJAVADOC-626] Add a stale javadoc detection mechanism
[MJAVADOC-624] tagletArtifacts throws exception in case artifact is a Java 9+ module
[MJAVADOC-614] - "No source files for package" in a directory with accent characters
[MJAVADOC-607] Add even links that produce errors to the resut set
[MJAVADOC-617] Normalize module path so that '..' in the path are resolved
[MJAVADOC-616] Fix bug in JavadocReportTest.testOptionsUmlautEncoding when run on Java 8 or older
MJAVADOC-580: javadoc:javadoc detects wrong java API link when running on openjdk 11.0.2
[MJAVADOC-578] Groups parameter is not compatibile with Surefire
Avoid converting separator characters into newline.
Added example of --add-modules to aggregate FAQ.
Include javadoc command line arguments for both http and https protocols for proxy.
Don't fail if module source path already exists.
Exclude non-exported packages when Java Modules are present.
fix mailing list url in README
[MJAVADOC-546] Allow to generate report in Spanish locale
[MJAVADOC-544] - Changed behaviour of Javadoc for temporary files encoding (options, argfile, ...)
[MJAVADOC-527] - detectLinks may pass invalid urls to javadoc
[MJAVADOC-444] add aggregate-no-fork and aggregate-test-no-fork for non-forking versions of aggregate goals.
